mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_HISTORY.ID ACCOUNTHISTORY_ID, ACCOUNT_HISTORY.USER_ID ACCOUNTHISTORY_USERID, ACCOUNT_HISTORY.WITHDRAW_ID ACCOUNTHISTORY_WITHDRAWID, ACCOUNT_HISTORY.CHARGE ACCOUNTHISTORY_CHARGE, ACCOUNT_HISTORY.TYPE ACCOUNTHISTORY_TYPE, ACCOUNT_HISTORY.CREATE_TIME ACCOUNTHISTORY_CREATETIME, ACCOUNT_HISTORY.REMARK ACCOUNTHISTORY_REMARK, ACCOUNT_HISTORY.DELETED ACCOUNTHISTORY_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into ACCOUNT_HISTORY
USER_ID,
WITHDRAW_ID,
CHARGE,
TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
REMARK,
DELETED,
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{withdrawId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{charge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update ACCOUNT_HISTORY
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WITHDRAW_ID = #{withdrawId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHARGE = #{charge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from ACCOUNT_HISTORY where DELETED = 0
